definitions.text: to travel behind, go after, come after
examples: The ducklings followed their mother around the pond
Please follow the guide through the museum

definitions.text: be later in time
come as a logical consequence; follow logically
examples: It follows that your assertion is false

definitions.text: travel along a certain course
act in accordance with someone's rules, commands, or wishes
come after in time, as a result
examples: A terrible tsunami followed the earthquake

definitions.text: behave in accordance or in agreement with
be next
examples: Mary plays best, with John and Sue following

definitions.text: choose and follow; as of theories, ideas, policies, strategies or plans
to bring something about at a later time than
examples: She followed dinner with a brandy
He followed his lecture with a question and answer period

definitions.text: imitate in behavior; take as a model
examples: Teenagers follow their friends in everything

definitions.text: follow, discover, or ascertain the course of development of something
examples: We must follow closely the economic development is Cuba

definitions.text: follow with the eyes or the mind
examples: Keep an eye on the baby, please!
She followed the men with the binoculars

definitions.text: be the successor (of)
examples: Will Charles succeed to the throne?

definitions.text: perform an accompaniment to
examples: The orchestra could barely follow the frequent pitch changes of the soprano

definitions.text: keep informed
examples: He kept up on his country's foreign policies

definitions.text: to be the product or result
accept and follow the leadership or command or guidance of
examples: She followed a guru for years

definitions.text: adhere to or practice
examples: These people still follow the laws of their ancient religion

definitions.text: work in a specific place, with a specific subject, or in a specific function
keep under surveillance
examples: The police had been following him for weeks but they could not prove his involvement in the bombing

definitions.text: follow in or as if in pursuit
examples: The police car pursued the suspected attacker
Her bad deed followed her and haunted her dreams all her life

definitions.text: grasp the meaning
examples: When he lectures, I cannot follow

definitions.text: keep to
